games.title: Snake Tangle
games.description:
Welcome to Snake Tangle, a thrilling and addictive puzzle game that will put your strategic thinking and problem-solving skills to the test!
In Tangled Snake, Your mission is to guide a mischievous snake through a tangled mess of obstacles and help it reach its tasty prey.

Snake Tangle features multiple levels of increasing difficulty. Each level presents a new maze layout, with more complex obstacles and narrower paths. As you progress, you'll face additional challenges such as moving barriers, time limits, and limited swipes, adding an extra layer of excitement and urgency to the gameplay.
Snake Tangle offers an engaging and challenging gameplay experience that will captivate puzzle enthusiasts and snake game lovers alike. So, get ready to twist, turn, and strategize your way through a tangled maze in this thrilling adventure!
games.howToPlayText:
To successfully navigate through the tangled maze, you'll need to carefully plan each move and consider the snake's current length and positioning.
The snake can only move in a straight line until it hits an obstacle or the maze's boundary, forcing you to plan the path ahead and avoid getting trapped.

games.title: Mr Shooter
games.description:
Mr Shooter, a Balloon popping desert plant on a mission... A mission to pop all the Balloons in the world!
The objective is simple: Pop all the Balloons to win!
Unlock and select new powerful cards as you progress through the game. With hundreds of creative and varied levels, this game will keep you entertained for hours.
games.howToPlayText:
Tap anywhere on the screen to shoot needles from Mr. Shooter.
Your goal is to hit the spinning cactus targets with your needles.
Donâ€™t hit other needles already stuck in the target or youâ€™ll lose!
Each level gets faster and trickier  can you beat them all?

games.title: Strike Force: Action Platformer
games.description:
Jump, shoot, and power up in this action-packed platformer!
Dive into an exciting adventure through colorful levels filled with enemies and non-stop action! Run along the route, dodge bullets, and fight off enemies attacking from all sides â€” charging straight at you, dropping in with parachutes, or firing from cover.

Collect ammo to stay in the fight, and make sure to blast enemy drones for powerful weapon upgrades. Unlock a roster of unique characters and grow stronger with every battle.

Game features:

Vibrant, eye-catching graphics

Intense shootouts with a variety of enemies

Explosive drone takedowns and weapon upgrades

A collection of heroes with different looks

Simple controls and addictive gameplay

games.title: Robbie: TikTak Slot Machines
games.description: Discover the exciting world of Robbie: TikTak Slot Machines, where online arcade fun meets thrilling challenges. Engage in various mini-games, collect tickets for rare pets, and unlock new machines. Spin the Wheel of Fortune for prizes and explore unique machines for exclusive rewards. Start your gaming adventure now!
games.howToPlayText:
In this game, youâ€™ll explore various arcade machines, each offering mini-games and challenges. Complete the challenges to earn tickets, which can be exchanged for rare pets or to unlock new machines. Spin the Wheel of Fortune for extra rewards and search for hidden secret machines to discover exclusive prizes. 

PC Controls:

Movement: W/A/S/D

Jump: Space

Camera Rotation: Mouse

Toggle Mouse Control: Tab (hide/show cursor)

Mobile Controls:

Movement: Virtual joystick (bottom left)

Jump: Button (bottom right)

games.title: Geometry Open World
games.description: Dive into the exciting realm of Geometry Open World, a dynamic 2D action game. Steer your vessel through challenging terrains, face various foes, and confront tough bosses. Utilize upgrades and skills to secure triumph. Ready to dominate this geometrical adventure? Enjoy it for free on your devices!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls
A or left arrow key = move left
D or right arrow key = move right
Q = use shield
E = use cannons
Left mouse button = interact with in-game UI

games.title: Super Frog Adventure
games.description: "Super Frog Adventure" is a great platformer that takes you into the world of classic Super Mario style games. The game features 8 incredible and challenging levels, each offering unique obstacles and challenges. Control the super frog, overcome obstacles, fight enemies and collect coins on your way to the finish line. Dynamic gameplay and vivid graphics will make your journey exciting and memorable. This game is designed for both beginners and experienced players, thanks to different difficulty levels and interesting gameplay mechanics. If you love classic platformers and are ready for a new adventure, "Super Frog Adventure" is waiting for you! Discover the amazing world of Super Frog and dive into an exciting platforming adventure!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop: Left/Right or A/D keyboard keys to move the character. Up arrow or W keyboard key to make the character jump.

Mobile: Use touch screen buttons.

Press jump button in the air to perform a double jump.

Collect all the fruits to pass the level!

games.title: Jiffy
games.description:
How fast can you react in a world full of obstacles and enemies? In Jiffy, a retro-style, fast-paced action platformer, every jump countsâ€”literally! Leap over obstacles, break through destructible blocks, and unleash powerful shots by double-tapping jump to take down foes. With over 25 levels, challenging bosses, and endless and battle modes, the action never stops. Ready to put your skills to the test?

Your goal is to reach the end of the level while overcoming obstacles and defeating enemies.

Desktop Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump: Spacebar

Shoot: Press Spacebar more than once

Mobile Controls:

Move, Jump: On-screen buttons.

Shoot: Tap the jump button more than once

Time your jumps carefully, break through obstacles, and take down enemies with precision. Good luck!
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to reach the end of the level while overcoming obstacles and defeating enemies.

Time your jumps carefully, break through obstacles, and take down enemies with precision. Good luck!
